management_assertions_challenged.management_claim: Financial statements prepared in accordance with IFRS
management_assertions_challenged.evidence_sought: Accounting policy references to current IFRS standards
management_assertions_challenged.evidence_found: References to outdated IAS 18, no IFRS 15, 9, 16 adoption
management_assertions_challenged.skeptical_conclusion: Claim questionable - not fully IFRS compliant

management_assertions_challenged.evidence_sought: Complete IAS 24 disclosures including terms, conditions, business rationale
management_assertions_challenged.skeptical_conclusion: Disclosures inadequate, transactions not fully transparent

disclosure_adequacy_assessment.missing_information: Nature of relationships, terms, conditions, business rationale

overall_skepticism_applied.skepticism_conclusion: High degree of skepticism warranted due to significant compliance gaps and incomplete disclosures
